ygData.subject: Re: Spell Resistance - the reason
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, I ll admit that I haven t gotten any real experience with using it. Not countless battles and such. I ll be hitting Aviak central tonight, and will
ygData.messageBody:
Well, I'll admit that I haven't gotten any real 'experience' with using it.
Not countless battles and such. I'll be hitting Aviak central tonight, and
will post my results tomorrow on a whole night of using it. Anyone got any
really good spell combos they use? My preferred burn is the following right
now:

Force Shock
Lightning Bolt
Root
Flame Shock

Around 400 pts of dmg. Haven't seen any blue that took that damage and lived
aside from Named beasts.

Before Force Shock I had to have a tank or I'd be running half the time from
blues.

BTW, with my enchanter friend we pack a MEAN punch, she'll lower magic
resistance I bomb, she whirls I step back and burn. Easy way to take reds
and yellows. Make friends with enchanters. you'll never regret it.

Zalbar The Mad
20th Wizard
Solusek Ro
